name: Invesco S&P MidCap Momentum ETF
description: The Invesco S&P MidCap Momentum ETF (MDYG) is an exchange-traded fund that aims to provide investors with exposure to mid-cap U.S. companies exhibiting strong momentum characteristics. Launched in 2014, MDYG follows the S&P MidCap 400 Momentum Index, which is designed to measure the performance of mid-cap stocks that have shown persistent price appreciation over the past year. The ETF focuses on companies that are not only well-established but also have demonstrated superior performance relative to their peers, making it an attractive option for growth-oriented investors. With a diversified portfolio of stocks across various sectors, MDYG seeks to capture the potential for higher returns associated with mid-cap equities, which have historically outperformed both small- and large-cap stocks over long investment horizons. The fund is managed by Invesco, a global investment management firm known for its comprehensive suite of investment products and strategies. MDYG caters to investors looking for a strategic investment in mid-cap stocks with an emphasis on momentum, providing a balance of growth and stability in their equity allocations.
